dbms.util
Class Page

java.lang.Object
  dbms.util.Page

public class Page
extends Object

Describes the page class as it is declared in our DBMS system. A page is the set of records that a leaf (primary or secondary) contains.

Field Summary

          The bucket factor.
private  int indexOfNextRecordToBeFilled
          The index of the next record that will be put into the page.
private  LinkedList<Record> records
          The list of records.

getRecord

Retrieves the record with index index.

Parameters:
index - The index of the record.
Returns:

insertRecord

public Object[] insertRecord(Record newRecord)
Inserts a record to the page.

Parameters:
newRecord - The new record.
Returns:
An Object[3] that contains information about the record inserted.

setRecordLast

public void setRecordLast(Record newRecord)
Inserts the new record to the last position of the page.

Parameters:
newRecord - The new record.

deleteRecord

public void deleteRecord(int index)
Deletes a record from the page. It actually makes the record a "dead" record and puts it last in the page. It does not remove the object itself.

Parameters:
index - The index of the record-target.

removeRecord

public Record removeRecord(int index)
Deletes a record from the page. It actually removes the object itself (on the contrary of the delete method.

Parameters:
index - The index of the record-target.
Returns:
The record that was removed.

getPageLength

public int getPageLength()
Retrieves the page length.

Returns:
The page length.

isReplete

public boolean isReplete()
Checks if the page is replete.

Returns:
true if the page is replete and false otherwise.

toByteArray

public byte[] toByteArray()
Converts the page to a byte array.

Returns:
the byte array
